AboutUsPage.title: ABOUT US
AboutUsPage.paragraph1: Verkotech is a specialized SAP and Thomson Reuters consulting firm dedicated to helping North American companies thrive with solutions across the Americas. With deep expertise in the chemical industry and a highly skilled bilingual team fluent in Portuguese and English, we provide strategic support for complex cross-border initiatives, from S/4HANA transformations to tax and trade compliance.
AboutUsPage.paragraph2: Our commitment is to deliver tailored, efficient, and future-ready SAP solutions that bridge business and technology across regions. At Verkotech, we believe true transformation happens when expertise, cultural understanding, and technology come together to move business forward.
AboutUsPage.paragraph3: Verkotech simplifies complexity. With deep industry knowledge, bilingual consultants, and a cross-border delivery model, we turn challenges into strategic advantages.
AboutUsPage.readyDescription: Reach out and discover how Verkotech can support your SAP journey.

leadership.title: OUR LEADERSHIP / MEET OUR CEO
leadership.p1: Over the past 20+ years, l've worked with organizations around the world to design and implement SAP solutions that make a real difference in how they operate. My passion is helping companies simplify what's complex-whether that means ensuring compliance with constantly changing tax rules or creating systems that grow with the business.
leadership.p2: Beyond client work, I believe in developing people. At Verkotech, I've built programs that train consultants using real business case scenarios, so they don't just learn the technology, they learn how to solve problems that matter. Seeing new professionals grow into trusted advisors is one of the most rewarding parts of my career.
leadership.p3: What drives me every day is building long-term partnerships, delivering tangible results, and leaving companies stronger and more resilient than when we started.

Change Management: Comprehensive training and adoption strategies to ensure smooth transitions
expertiseItems: Decades of experience in regulated industries (e.g., Chemicals, Oil & Gas, Manufacturing)
Certified SAP consultants with global rollout background
Specialized in multi-entity architecture, tax compliance, and intercompany flows
Deep understanding of S/4HANA migration complexities and best practices

expertiseItems: Certified OneSource Global Trade consultants with deep regulatory knowledge
Experience in cross-border trade management and customs compliance
Expertise in import/export documentation, duty optimization, and trade finance
Specialized knowledge of Americas trade corridors and regulations

PrivacyPage.introPart1: Verkotech respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard information when you visit our website

s1.title: 1. Information We Collect
s1.intro: When you use our Site, we may collect the following types of information:
s1.personalDesc: Name, email address, phone number, company name, and any other details you submit through our contact forms.
s1.usageDesc: Information automatically collected, such as IP address, browser type, device information, pages visited, and time spent on the Site.
s1.cookiesDesc: We use cookies and analytics tools (such as Google Analytics) to understand how visitors use our Site and improve performance.

s2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
s2.intro: We use the collected information to:
items: Respond to inquiries and provide requested services.
Communicate with you about our services, proposals, and updates.
Improve our website functionality, user experience, and security.

s3.title: 3. Sharing of Information
s3.intro: We do not sell or rent your personal information. We may share it only with:
items: Service providers and business partners who help us operate the Site or deliver services.
Legal authorities, if required by law or to protect our rights.

s4.title: 4. Data Retention
s4.text: We keep your personal information only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this Policy or as required by law.

s5.title: 5. Your Rights
s5.intro: Depending on your location, you may have rights under data protection laws (such as GDPR or CCPA), including:
items: The right to access, update, or delete your information.
The right to opt out of marketing communications.
The right to request a copy of the personal data we hold about you.
s5.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us at

s6.title: 6. Security
s6.text: We implement reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, loss, misuse, or disclosure.

s7.title: 7. Cookies
s7.text: You can manage or disable cookies in your browser settings. Note that some features of the Site may not function properly if cookies are disabled.

s8.title: 8. Third-Party Links
s8.text: Our Site may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of those sites.

s9.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
s9.text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. The updated version will be posted on this page with a new "Last updated" date.

s10.title: 10. Contact Us
s10.intro: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
